message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $155.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $145. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $152.50.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still thinking $145 is a fair price for the product. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I've already made a few concessions, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $150. This is my final offer.
